Sept. 16, 1916 D West Wales BBA Contest (Class B)
West Wales BBA Contest (Class B) 220 Test Piece Contest West Wales BBA Festival Contest west-wales-bba-contest-class-b

Prince and Peasant
Pontardulais, Swansea, Wales, UK Owing to the war this was a combined class B and C. Prizes - 1st £8 and Shield, 2nd £4, 3rd £2. 6 bands competed.
